pull.title: QA: Avoid re-reading config.ini unnecessarily
pull.body: BitcoinTestFramework.main already loads and stores config.ini on the object itself; just access that instead of re-reading the file to check for features

events.message:
QA: Avoid re-reading config.ini unnecessarily

BitcoinTestFramework.main already loads and stores config.ini on the object itself; just access that instead of re-reading the file to check for features

events.body:

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15876](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15876.html) ([rpc] signer bump fee by Sjors)
* [#15382](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15382.html) ([util] add runCommandParseJSON by Sjors)
* [#14912](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14912.html) ([WIP] External signer support (e.g. hardware wallet) by Sjors)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
